EmailTemplate.name: RE: MBO Partners / Kenneth Milstead (1343060507.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: RE: MBO Partners / Kenneth Milstead (1343060507.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly: - - Consultant Services Email - - Clean Clean false false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE MicrosoftInternetExplorer4 Hi Ken, Please see my comments below in blue: Thanks!Sara From: Kenneth Milstead [mailto:milstead@medelle.com] <mailto:[mailto:milstead@medelle.com]> Sent: Sunday, July 22, 2012 12:10 AM To: Sara Conde Subject: Re: MBO Partners / Kenneth Milstead Sara, I sent you the contact info earlier today for the Biomimetics contract. Megan has the details for her discussions so far, and she can put you in touch with the contracts people at the client. We increased the billing rate to $ 80 per hour. We still expect an average of 30 hours weekly though this may be higher or lower in a given week based on the client's needs. We agreed on a billing frequency of twice monthly (1st and 15th of each month). Sounds good – just sent her our MSA and WO. We are happy to work with their contract as well if they prefer. As far as insurance and tax info: (1) My health insuance is currently covered through another group with which I'm working as a W2 employee so I will not be participating in the MBO Partners plan at this time. That’s totally fine, the plan is optional. (2) I would like to participate in the basic and supplemental life insurance (maximum amount), the spouse life insurance (maximum amount), and the long-term disability coverage. Age for me is 46. Age for my wife is 41. This is what is reflected in your Business Center. If you would like to review this information you can click on “personal info” (top menu bar) and then “Benefits” (left menu) (3) Federal and state withholding should be married with 2 exemptions. This will need to be updated in your Business Center, as of now you have 0 exemptions. To update - click on “payroll” (top menu) and then “withholding” (left menu). Let me know if you need help, for security reasons I cannot make this change for you. (4) I would like to contribute the maximum amount for 401k and matching funds. (At what frequency can this percentage be adjusted? I currently have other income, but I may need to reduce the 401k percentage if I do not continue working on the other projects at some point in the future.) You may update your 401(k) deferral at any time but clicking on “personal info” -> “benefits.” Right now you are contributing 18%. If you would like to fully maximize you will need to increase your deferral. Can you please provide updated estimates based on the above information so that I can have a better idea of whether this 401k contribution rate is feasible? Sure thing, please find it attached. What other start-up paperwork do you need from me? You will need to log in and click on “personal info” from there click on “i-9 information update” You will need to fill in list A with your US passport information. You will then click save and then print. When the I-9 prints, you will sign/date section 1 and local notary will sign/date section 2 (most people visit their local bank.) Please email or fax back to MBO (we do not need an original copy.) I will need an image of your US passport to comply with E-Verify (most people just take a picture with their phone and then email it to me.) ___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCVlBesV44xvOLI63NnDzUNJunttYXY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://www.mbopartners.com/?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCVlBesV44xvOLI63NnDzUNJunttYXY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D> Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&mailto:postmaster@mbopartners.com?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCVlBesV44xvOLI63NnDzUNJunttYXY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D> and permanently delete the e-mail and files. Thanks, Ken From: Sara Conde <sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com>> To: Kenneth Milstead <milstead@medelle.com <mailto:milstead@medelle.com>> Sent: Wednesday, July 18, 2012 4:30 PM Subject: RE: MBO Partners / Kenneth Milstead Hi Ken, How about that! I have attached the net cash showing · $75 per hour· 30 hours per week· Louisiana · $500 in miscellanies expense deductions (just an arbitrary figure, this is the low end of what I typically see consultants expense monthly.) I have some openings if you just want to give me a ring tomorrow when you are free. If you want to schedule something You may easily book a time that is convenient for you on my online schedule by going here <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&https://my.timedriver.com/8SLYS?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCdlhVplNz6vi5L6zpmjnMf9artLEXY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D>. I look forward to speaking with you! Sara ___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCdlhVplNz6vi5L6zpmjnMf9artLEXY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://www.mbopartners.com/?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCdlhVplNz6vi5L6zpmjnMf9artLEXY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D> Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&mailto:postmaster@mbopartners.com?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCdlhVplNz6vi5L6zpmjnMf9artLEXY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D> and permanently delete the e-mail and files. From: Kenneth Milstead [mailto:milstead@medelle.com] <mailto:[mailto:milstead@medelle.com]> Sent: Wednesday, July 18, 2012 1:54 PM To: Sara Conde Subject: Re: MBO Partners / Kenneth Milstead Sara, Perfect timing! I was planning to call you today or tomorrow regarding a contract that I'm negotiating. Can you run some figures for me for the following info: $ 75 per hour x 30 hours weeklyLouisiana residentWork will be done in Louisiana for a Tennessee client (so no need to worry about cross-state income tax issues since TN does not have an income tax) I'd love to talk tomorrow (Thusday) to discuss details. Anytime on Thursday that works for you will work for me. Today is a bit crazy since I had some travel delays yesterday. I may also have another contract (with per diem) to throw into the mix by tomorrow, but I should have the details on this tomorrow. Thanks,Ken From: Sara Conde <sconde@mbopartners.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCdlhVplNz6vi5L6zpmjnMf9artLEXY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D>> To: milstead@medelle.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&mailto:milstead@medelle.com?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCdlhVplNz6vi5L6zpmjnMf9artLEXY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D> Sent: Tuesday, July 17, 2012 10:03 AM Subject: MBO Partners / Kenneth Milstead Dear Kenneth,We had a conversation some time ago regarding our services. As a courtesy I wanted to follow up and get an update from you. We also are now publishing an Independent Consulting Brief. It's a monthly email that provides access to a convenient list of relevant resources, tools and best practices. You can sign up for it by going to http://www.mbopartners.com/independent-consulting-brief <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://www.mbopartners.com/independent-consulting-brief?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCdlhVplNz6vi5L6zpmjnMf9artLEXY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D>. Feel free to provide an update by simply replying to this email.Regards,Sara___________________________________Sara CondeConsultant Services AdvisorMBO Partners t: 703-793-6028f: 703.793.6081e: sconde@mbopartners.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCdlhVplNz6vi5L6zpmjnMf9artLEXY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://www.mbopartners.com/?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCdlhVplNz6vi5L6zpmjnMf9artLEXY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D>
